column4: zyxnull:are there newer ATI drivers than the fglrx that ships with 7.10?

zyxnull:I thought thats what you guys were talkin about...i will try them...i am trying to get my desktop to extend to the second display on an ATI AIW 9600...perhaps i will have better luck with the newer drivers...on my way to the site now...thanks!
zyxnull:BTW...I don't need to run Compiz to simply extend to the other monitor, do I?
